dialogue.text: Ahhh, you're back. I can see that you're at level 10 now. It looks like you're flashing a glimmer of hope towards becoming a Knight. The basic training has now ended, and it's time for you to make the decision.

Now look to the left. The leaders of the Knights will be waiting for you. There will be 5 paths for you to choose from. All you need to do is choose one of them. All 5 of them will lead you to the path of a Knight, so... I suggest you pay attention to what each path offers, and select the one you'd most like to take.
